(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

IEFIL JEWELRY

Special Gifts for a Special Moment.

IEFIL JEWELRY is a creative jewelry company.

We have our own jewelry designers and factories.

Each jewelry has exquisite packaging and is ready to be given to your loved ones as gifts at any time.

We believe that every piece of jewelry has its own meaning, and they are unique.

ROSE FLOWER GIFTS FOR HER

I LOVE YOU GIFTS FOR HER

Mom Gifts

LOVE GIFTS FOR HER

SISTER GIFTS

DAUGHTER GIFTS

925 STERLING SILVER NECKLACE

925 STERLING SILVER NECKLACE

NANA GIFTS

MOM GIFTS

NEW MOM GIFTS

AUNT NIECE GIFTS

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 9, 2022
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B65KC345

GIFTS FOR WOMEN: The dainty heart necklace comes with a beautiful gift box, a gift bag, a round card and an adorable little Envelope, ready for giving. And our packaging is 99% biodegradable. Perfect gifts for your mom, wife, girlfriend, daughter, sister, friend on Birthday, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day or other special days.
MATERIALS: The chain and pendant are both made of 925 Sterling Silver. This is a high quality stuff that will not turn your skin to green, red or itchy. The chain is strong enough to wear for a long time.
SIZE: Chain is 18inches + 2 inches (Adjustable). This length works on practically anyone. It’s a excellent gift choice for women or girls daily wearing home or office.
AFTER – SALES SERVICE: We are committed to providing a 90-day refund service. If you are interested in or question the birthstone necklace, please contact us in time. We will reply you within 24 hours and give you a satisfactory answer.

BEST GIFTS FOR WOMEN


I LOVE YOU FOR ALWAYS & FOREVER

Birthstone Necklace for Women

GIFTS FOR WOMEN

Unique necklace send to the special women in your life and let her know how much she means to you. At the center of the heart pendant is a birthstone and it represents the month of her birth. When she wear this heart pendant necklace, she genuinely happy for this little surprise. Perfect gifts for your mom, grandma, wife, girlfriend, daughter, sister or any other awesome lady on Birthday, Mother’s Day, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Anniversary or other special days.



925 Sterling Silver

DAINTY NECKLACES FOR WOMEN

The chain and pendant are both made of 925 Sterling Silver. This is a high quality stuff that will not turn your skin to green, red or itchy. The chain is strong enough and will not break.

  1. January-April

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Garnet in January means Chastity, Friendship, Fidelity.
    • Amethyst in February means Chastity, Courage, Honesty.
    • Aquamarine in March means Composure, Courage, Happiness.
    • White Topaz in April means Firm and Eternal Love.


  2. May-August

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Emerald in May means Kindness, Confidence, Kindness, Happiness.
    • Alexandrite in June means Healthy and long life.
    • Ruby in July means Love, Passion, Radiance.
    • Peridot In August removes people’s fears and gives the wearer a happy marriage.


  3. September-December

    Birthstone Necklaces for Women

    • Sapphire in September means Loyalty, Steadfastness, Love and Honesty.
    • Pink Sapphire in October means strong.
    • Citrine in November means Sincere and Friendly.
    • Tanzanite in December means joyful.


Buyer Show


Is it made cheaply or is it high quality?

The pendant and chain of this necklace are made of 925 sterling silver, high quality.

What if my necklace breaks?

In the case of non-human intentional damage, your necklace has a broken chain or faded pendant, please let us know and we will send you a new necklace as compensation.

How can I take care of my necklace?

1.Try not to leave the necklace in the water for a long time

2.Do not wear the necklace for strenuous exercise, sweat will reduce the life of the necklace.

3.When you are not wearing it, please wipe it with a soft cloth and store it in a jewelry box.

What is this package?

The birthstone necklace comes with an IEFIL gift bag, an IEFIL jewelry box, a little envelopes, a thank you card and a silver polishing cloth. Ready for give as a gift.

About IEFIL JEWELRY?

IEFIL JEWELRY is a creative jewelry company and we have our own jewelry designers and factories.

Welcome to join us, we are glad to see you share your valuable suggestions about our products.
